reviews.review: A very good puzzle and strategy game. A lot of fun to play. Great story!
одна из немногих головоломок,которые мне понравились
Eines meiner Lieblingsspiele überhaupt. Ich bin etwas spät dran, um dieses Meisterwerk zu rezensieren, also, ähm, ja, viel Spaß, haha, schönes Spiel, ja.

Pretty good, although a lot of the puzzles out side of test rooms are very tedious. The mac version has some problems. When I opened the game back up after m first session I could not turn around, but after I restarted the game it was fine. The ending was very nice I liked the song that played and it game me chills. It's to bad the game crashed right after that! I didn't even get to see the credits.
Excelente jogo, grande continuação para Portal. Você acha que escapou do inferno? Se prepare...

The good part: One of the best games i have played and super fun to play with a friend. The bad part: The game doesn't  give you a hint if your stuck and there is no button to press if you get stuck.

0 геев из 10
One of the best games I've played!

Portal 2 - лучшая игра от Valve за последние десять лет. Я эту игру считаю лучше Half-Life. Отличный сюжет,различные головоломки. Жалко, что эта игра короткая. После нескольких решении головоломки, эту игру можно пройти за час. И после этого ты можешь играть в кооператив с друзьями или со случайными игроками, или сыграть в мастерской от других игроков, которые делают загадки в два раза сложнее чем оригинале. Игра 10 из 10
Great game with a unique idea. Beautiful implementation of space manipulation in a puzzle game, and of course GLaDOS!!
Best puzzle game ever made with an amazing story and gameplay.
оч классна,мозго дробилка,кому нужны знания по матешу,сюда :)
Good game, good story, great gameplay

Dragon Rating: 7/10

This game has a lot going for it in terms of game design, puzzle mechanics and overall enjoyment. The cooperative function is also a good feature but doesn't add any story or plot lines to the game. The overall replay value is simply to obtain missed achievements, there is no real reason to replay it beyond achievements or simply a sense of nostalgia.
ну чё сказать, теперь эта игра у меня стоит на первом месте в списке годных
